name: sidestep
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to step to the side in order to avoid something, especially being hit: He sidestepped the blow/the tackle.
to avoid talking about a subject, especially by starting to talk about something else: The speaker sidestepped the question by saying that it would take him too long to answer it.
